text:
*Podia is hiring a Creative Content Writer* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Podia is looking to add a content creator to its world-class team. This person will write two longform pieces per week, plus handle other content tasks like creating visuals, doing SEO research, help maintain the site and dive deep into Podia's creator community.


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/24952-creative-content-writer-podia>

<@UJWJLLD63>
